title: 'Morning Edition' Listeners Share 'Love Lock' Stories
teaser: Hundreds of thousands of "love locks" were removed from a Paris bridge. Officials say the bridge can no longer handle the locks' weight. We asked listeners to share memories of love on the bridge.
contentencoded:
Hundreds of thousands of "love locks" were removed from a Paris bridge on Monday. Officials say the bridge can no longer handle the locks' weight. We asked our social media followers to share memories of love on the bridge.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
